setting-Size-desc: The size the game takes in the browser window
setting-Next-desc: Changes the length in pieces of the next queue
setting-NextSide-desc: Changes the side of the next queue
setting-Monochrome-desc: Use only white for block skins
setting-Outline-desc: Options for an outline around the pieces. 'Hidden' hides the stack.
setting-Ghost-desc: Options for the ghost piece. 'Hidden' hides the active piece.
setting-Messages-desc: Displays flying text for things like "SINGLE", "DOUBLE", etc. Also shows the combo and back-to-back streak counter.
setting-MatrixSway-desc: When enabled, the playfield will react to the force of the pieces and move slightly.
setting-InitialVis-desc: When enabled, the initials systems will show during gameplay
setting-Sound-desc: Completely enable or disable the sound system
setting-Soundbank-desc: Modifies the audio bank of the game
setting-NextSound-desc: Plays a sound for a specific piece when it arrives in the next queue
setting-NextType-desc: Modifies the audio bank of the next queue audio indicators
setting-Voicebank-desc: Modifies the soundbank of the announcer
setting-ARR-desc: How long it takes before the autoshift kicks in; default 10 frames
setting-DAS-desc: How fast the autoshift goes; default 2 frames
setting-Gravity-desc: Override the speed at which pieces fall; default 'Auto'
setting-SoftDrop-desc: Speed at which the piece soft drops; default 1G
setting-LockDelay-desc: The amount of time a piece can stay landed before it locks to the stack; default 30 frames
setting-IRSMode-desc: Allow the rotation of a piece before it appears
setting-IHSMode-desc: Allow the holding of a piece before it appears
setting-DigCheese-desc: Dig through a cheesed stack instead of a diagonal one
setting-GradesGameRule-desc: Determines the tuning of the game
setting-MarathonLevelCap-desc: When on, set the maximum level to 15. When off, level will continously rise with the lock delay shortening after 20G.
setting-MarathonEntryDelay-desc: Determines how long the game pauses between pieces
setting-MarathonNoGravity-desc: Disable gravity for a more relaxed game
setting-MarathonInvisible-desc: Make the stack become invisible at level 21
setting-SurvivalZenMode-desc: Garbage will appear by piece instead of by time
setting-SurvivalStartingLevel-desc: Determines how far ahead you'll start in the challenge (not compatible with zen, currently)
setting-SprintPieceSet-desc: The types of pieces used during the game
setting-SprintBackfire-desc: Have lines sent back to you
setting-RetroGameType-desc:
A-Type: Play Forever 
B-Type: Reach 25 Lines
setting-RetroHardDrop-desc: Allow the use of hard drop
setting-RetroFlashing-desc: Show a screen flash upon clearing a Quad
setting-MasterLock-desc:
Determines how the lockdown will function.

Forgiving: Lock delay will reset upon all manipulations

Limited: Lock delay will reset for a limited amount of manipulations

Strict: Lock delay will reset only when a piece has fallen
